siteMetadata.title: rantum.dev
siteMetadata.subtitle: digital dwelling of andrew maury. digital developer @ecomloop in burlingame, ca. san matean nantucketer on a rantum scoot.

frontmatter.title: Internalizing virtues
frontmatter.description: The right instinctual thought processes can turn problems into opportunities, find silver linings, and generally change perceptions of the same experiences

frontmatter.title: Dictate direction, avoid anxiety
frontmatter.description: Be proactive about dictating direction of days. Don't wait for news from others to determine next steps.

frontmatter.title: Outdoor recreation is best natural escape
frontmatter.description: Nature is rejuvenating and a natural stress reliever. Make time for outdoor recreation as an escape.

frontmatter.title: Respect self with sound decisions
frontmatter.description: Mistakes will be made. There's a risk and reward to all actions. Weigh them soundly.

frontmatter.title: Stay in control with backup plans
frontmatter.description: Keep options. Pay for the insurance when there are unknowns.

frontmatter.title: Declutter mind to address anxieties
frontmatter.description: When the world changes drastically, the mind can become decluttered easily. There's a lot to process and there are many changes, some readily apparently and others in the subconcious.
